title: Panthers vs. Buccaneers: How to watch London NFL game, TV channel, betting line
text:
CLOSE SportsPulse: If there was ever a week to bet Week 6 may be one of the best. Lorenzo gives his locks for the weekend. USA TODAY

NFL fans wanting to catch the Carolina Panthers and Tampa Bay Buccaneers in London will have to wake up early on Sunday.

The league's international series is back for the second consecutive week, but the kickoff is in an earlier window. The matchup will be the second of the season between the two NFC South foes after Tampa Bay prevailed 20-14 in a Week 2 game at Carolina. But the teams' fortunes have shifted since then, as the Panthers have won their last three games, while the Buccaneers have dropped two of their last three.

Carolina will be going with quarterback Kyle Allen again with Cam Newton still out with a foot injury.

Time: Sunday, 9:30 a.m. ET, Tottenham Hotspur Stadium, London

TV: NFL Network

Live stream: fuboTV

betMGM line: Panthers by 1.5
description: The Carolina Panthers and Tampa Bay Buccaneers will take their NFC South grudge to London on Sunday when they square off at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
